sentences.sContent: Where within this they can establish cultivation, collaboration, and competence culture and they can actually really do all the amazing things that Agile supports them to do and can get great results.
sentences.sContent_eng: Where within this they can establish cultivation, collaboration, and competence culture and they can actually really do all the amazing things that Agile supports them to do and can get great results.
sentences.sCn: 在这个空间内，人们可以建立培养、协作和胜任文化，他们真的可以做各种由敏捷支持的、令人惊奇的事情，而且得到出色的成果。

synos.tran: [细胞][微]培养；耕作；[农学]耕种；教化；文雅

words.tran: 可培养的，可教化的；可耕种的
发展（cultivate的过去分词）；耕作；教化

trans.tranOther: the deliberate development of a particular quality or skill
